name: TransportationInsecurityScreeningAssessmentsAnswers
title: Transportation Insecurity Screening Assessments Answers
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represents answers to screening assessment questions for Transportation Insecurity as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: This set of values may be used to represent screening assessment answers in observations, questionnaires, and questionnaire responses for this SDOH domain (e.g., for the SDOHCC Observation Screening Response profile in the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide).),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for answers to SDOH screening assessment questions as selected by the Gravity Project.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes the answers to questions not selected by the Gravity Project from SDOH screening assessments.)

concept.display: My transportation is readily available, affordable, and car is adequately insured
My transportation is generally accessible to meet basic travel needs
My transportation is available and reliable, but limited and/or inconvenient; drivers are licensed and minimally insured
My transportation is available, but unreliable, unpredictable, unaffordable; may have car but no insurance, license, etc.
I have no access to transportation, public or private; may have car that is inoperable
I choose not to answer this question
Yes, it has kept me from medical appointments or from getting my medications
Yes, it has kept me from non-medical meetings, appointments, work, or from getting things that I need
Yes, it has kept me from medical appointments or getting medications
